data.text: @natashasandamas Hello Tash, we are deeply sorry for the situation and all constraints caused. In case we can be of further assistance, please let us know. Thank you.
@EleonoraIacovi1 Olá Eleonora, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@wolfofwallsend1 @TAPair_Lawsuit Hello the wolf of wallsend, we have replied to your comment via private message. Thank you.

@Bueckersche Hello Heike, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. After an analysis of the situation, we inform you that it is possible to issued the non-boarding declaration via Twitter. In order to do so, please send us, via private message, your email. Thank you.

data.text:
Dos nossos hangares para o mundo. 🌍

From our hangars to the World. 🌍

📷: IG dani_tma https://t.co/DCA4YZYUBn
@oriana_briones Hola Oriana, pedimos disculpas por las molestias ocasionadas y le informamos que hemos respondido a su mensaje privado. Gracias.

@samuelrpoirier Hello S., we apologize, but we are not able to provide a time frame for the contact. However, if you wish, we can verify if the claim was correctly submitted. In order to do so, please provide us, via private message, with the file number and email associated. Thank you.
@Ruthieloves Hello Ruth, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@ily06132021 Hello, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@Danniigxx Hello Danielle, we inform you that the dimensions of a cabin luggage cannot surpass 55 x 40 x 20 cm (height x length x width). Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.
@daftmama Hello DaftMama, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@rorycalland Hello Rory, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you.
@itsnotmorgen Hello #1 TECH HO@itsnotmorgen, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you.

@ageekymom Hello Lisa, in order to verify the situation, please provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

data.text:
@abmoli2 Hola Ana, pedimos disculpas por el retraso en contestar.
Para que podamos verificar, por favor indique su código de reserva o número de billete electrónico por mensaje privado. Gracias.
@NProssen Hello Nathy, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you.

@jangeissler Hello Jan, we apologise for all the distress caused by this situation. In order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference or the ticket number? For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you.
@Otinga8 Hello Otinga, you will be notified as soon as additional information is available. Thank you.

@jackburgess10 You will be contacted per e-mail as soon as the analysis is completed and thus we kindly ask you to wait a little while longer, thanking you for your understanding.
Should there be anything else we can help you with at the moment, please let us know. Thank you. 2/2

@jackburgess10 Hello Jack, we apologise for the distress caused. We have already reinforced your case, but due to the high volume of work, we cannot inform you a resolution date. However we guarantee that your case deserves our best attention and will not be forgotten. 1/2

@nadiagrrray Hello Nadia, we apologise for all the distress caused. In order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference, the ticket number and your email address? For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you in advance.

@RimSarah Could you please provide us with that PIR code regarding your lost property? For security reasons and also for your data protection, we kindly request that you send the details through a private message instead. Thank you. 2/2

data.text: @RimSarah Hello, we apologise for all the distress caused by this situation. Missing items should immediately be reported at the airport Lost & Found desks near the baggage carousels, where your complaint will be registered and a report of the mishandled baggage will be issued. 1/2

@prpgpt Olá Paulo,
Poderá por favor indicar-nos via DM como pretende que o reembolso seja efetuado?

@Tullzy_6 Hello, 
In order to assist you, please let us know your booking reference and/or ticket number and the three dimensions and weight of the bike. (1/2)

@jvcprado Joao,
Tal como já explicámos anteriormente, a bagagem não pode ser adicionada através da TAP com esta antecedência porque o primeiro voo é operado pela GOL. Neste caso, deve contatar essa companhia aérea parceira ou adquirir a sua bagagem extra no aeroporto no dia do seu voo.

@jvcprado Joao,
Relembramos que adquiriu uma tarifa TAP|Basic, que inclui apenas uma bagagem de porão e uma de mão, como poderá confirmar aqui:
https://t.co/JXl8dCzWrT
Caso tenha algum comprovante da compra de um bilhete incluindo 2 bagagens de porão, por favor envie-nos.

urls.title: Produtos TAP – Escolha como deseja voar
urls.description: Encontre o produto TAP adequado a você: saiba o que inclui cada produto e ainda o preço de marcação de assento ou bagagem extra.

data.text:
@jvcprado Joao,
Já respondemos à sua DM.

@TotahVictoire Hello Victoire,
May you please let us know your booking code via DM?

@jvcprado Olá João,
Indique-nos por favor o seu código de reserva via DM para verificarmos a sua questão.

@HalesToby Toby,
We have just replied to your DM and hopefully clarified your questions.
@saulortizs Saúl, ¿puede indicarnos el número del billete eletrónico, por favor? Por cuestiones de seguridad, le pedimos que nos envie los datos por mensaje privado. Gracias.
@saulortizs Hola Saúl, hemos contestado su mensaje privado. Gracias.
@chaimweit Olá Chaim, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@lavicctorie Olá victorie,
Já respondemos à sua DM.

@AlexThorne1 Hello Alex,
We confirm that the email is fraudulent and not sent from TAP.
https://t.co/mn7HEPBTV6
If you need any further assistance, please let us know via DM.

urls.title: Alerts and informations
urls.description: Keep up to date with all the alerts and important information concerning TAP Air Portugal's airports and flights.

data.text: @icacind Olá Ingrid, estamos a verificar a situação. Obrigado.
@lynnziemm Hello Lynnzie, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@MonSrvAUclient Nous vous informons que nous avons répondu a votre message privé. Merci.
@HalesToby Hello Toby, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@paulieok Hi! As previously informed via DM, your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will receive feedback via email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@AlisonDinning78 Hello Alison, we will contact you as soon as we obtain any new information on this matter.
Thank you
@hannahmc38 Hello Hannah, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@MasterBarata Hello João, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@SGE_Eletronica Olá Clênio, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@CojoneroTapon Hello, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@gonzalezacuna @gonzalezacuna Raul, gracias por contestar. Si tiene alguna pregunta adicional, por favor póngase en contacto.    
Gracias.
@barryvanoostrum Hi! We thank you for the details sent. We have in the meantime already replied to your DM. Thank you
@britiburcio Hello Bridget, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@AguRamirezJ Hello Augusto, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@gonzalezacuna @gonzalezacuna Hola Raul, lamentamos la situación y las molestias ocasionadas. Le rogamos que haga el envío de los datos por mensaje directo, por razones de seguridad. 
Gracias.
@Sudhir_Rajan Hello Sudhir, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@barryvanoostrum Hi! We deeply regret the delay of your luggage. To better assist you, please DM us your lost luggage claim number. Thank you in advance

@USAisHome Hi! Although we understand your urgency, you will need to await our feedback via email, which will happen once the analysis is completed. We appreciate your patience at this time. Thank you in advance

@BaconAdele Bonsoir! Nous vous informons que votre dossier est toujours en cours de vérification. Vous serez contacté par mail dès que possible. Nous vous prions de bien vouloir patienter. En attendant, nous restons à votre disposition pour toute aide complémentaire. Merci d'avance
@BBQBacalao Hola, es responsabilidad de los pasajeros verificar las condiciones de entrada en los países, directamente con las autoridades responsables de entrada. Gracias.

@tarrafalense Hello Dani, 
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@marcoswenzel Olá Marcos,

poderá usar os seguintes contatos:

Telefone
(+44) 345 350 0100
De 2ª a domingo: Das 8h às 24h (WET), hora de Portugal continental
@michellewelch05 Hi Michelle, thank you.

@Shrutzzz3102 Hello Shruti,

can you inform us through DM your lost luggage file number (PIR), bag tag and booking reference related so we may verify? Thank you.
@jemchappers Hi Julia, we've replied to your DM. Thank you

@Ruthieloves Hello Ruth,
Please proide us the booking reference and which is the required change. Also, due to security reasons, we kindly request that you send us the details through a private message. Thank you

@bethany_cammack Hello Bethany, 
Once again we apologize for all the inconveniences caused.
We have answered your private message and remain available to assist you.
Thank you.
@KingBishot Hola KingBishot, ¿nos podría informar, por mensaje directo, su código de reserva o número de billete electrónico (047...), para que podamos verificar, por favor? Gracias.
@xnady3 Hello nadiah, we apologize for not replying sooner. Please let us know if we can still assist you through this channel, via direct message. We are available.

@MonSrvAUclient Bonjour @monsrvauclient,  nous vous informons que l'information a bien été reçue, nous vérifions et reprendrons contact dès que possible.
Merci.
@carolc1965 @carolc1965 Hello, we replied to your DM. Thank you.

@samuelrpoirier We suggest you to delete your navigation history, cookies and cache information before trying again, if the error message persists, please contact us via PM. 
Thank you. (2/2)

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@KiaraKing4444 Hello Kiara, we regret the inconvenience caused and inform you that we have replied via Facebook.
Thank you.

data.text: @Natalia16082009 @natalia16082009 Olá, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@expatjoys Hello, in order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference or the ticket number? For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you.

@yperse @yperse Hello Hedie, we apologize for the delay in the resolution of your refund. We assure you that the process will be completed as soon as possible. 
In the meantime if you have some additional question, let us know. Thank you.

@AndyGaby90 Hola Andy, lamentamos la situación y las molestias ocasionadas. Su reclamación sigue en análisis. Tan pronto como se concluya el análisis recibirá una respuesta por e-mail.  
Gracias por su comprensión.

@hopscotchwizard @hopscotchwizard Hello Jay, can you provide us with your refund identification number (ROR) and e-mail address?
For security reasons we advise to send it by DM. Thank you.

@tyler90755493 @tyler90755493 Hello tyler, can you provide us with the complaint number? For security reasons we kindly advise to send it by DM. 
Thank you.

@George_InsureMe @TAP_Portugal @george_insureme Hello George,
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Your query is still being analysed and has been reinforced.  
We kindly ask you to wait for a feedback, which will be sent as soon as possible. 
Thank you for understanding.
